### Doggy Day Care

These charming puppy dogs need your help today! They are looking for some entertainment during these days of holiday traveling when their families are off visiting their relatives, these dogs are staying in the kennels playing ball with each other!

### How to Play Doggy Day Care

Drag and drop the desired item to the dog to satisfy their wishes. Do it on time and win these 8 cute and addicting levels.
